timeline.title: Android Developer
timeline.desc: I started my career at Habilelabs Pvt. Ltd. as android mobile application developer

timeline.title: Internship
timeline.desc: Completed my internship from Genx Soft. My major part of the internship has been into the field of developing creative native android mobile application with reach UX and better performance.

timeline.title: Undergraduate
timeline.desc: Completed my under-graduation studies with Computer Science and Technology. During my collage time I learn C/C++, Data Structure, Java, Android and develop Expense Tracking Mobile Application as my minor project and Centralize Data sharing Project as my Major project.
